items.question: I already use Raycast/Alfred. Why do I need this?
items.answer: Raycast opens 'tools'; Galpi opens 'tasks'. Raycast launches your PDF viewer. Galpi opens page 14 of that specific PDF. Use them together: Raycast for launching apps, Galpi for navigating context.

items.question: No subscription? How is this sustainable?
items.answer: Our monthly server cost is $0. Galpi is local-first. We don't pay for cloud processing because your Mac does the work. One-time sales easily cover development and updates.

items.question: What happens to my links if I stop using Galpi?
items.answer: They stay yours. Galpi doesn't use a proprietary DB. Every link is in a JSONL text file in your documents. You can open and read it with any text editor.

items.question: Will links break if I move files?
items.answer: Galpi hunts them down. We don't just remember the path. Using macOS Inodes and xattr, we track the file's unique ID. Move it, rename itâ€”Galpi finds it.

engineerNote.title: An Engineer's Apology for 30ms
engineerNote.subtitle: "Full disclosure: We use AppleScript too."
paragraphs: To connect apps on macOS perfectly, AppleScript is inevitable. Our competitors use it, and we do too.
But there is a world of difference between 'using' it and 'optimizing' it.
While others toss around heavy blocks of script that make your Mac stutter, we've surgically optimized every line. Furthermore, we tap into the Accessibility API to snatch information instantly.

The result: 30ms.
A reaction time faster than human perception.
This isn't just an app. It's an tribute to Mac users from a developer obsessed with speed. Your RAM belongs to your creativity, not to the utilities waiting in the background.

faqs.question: I have Hookmark. Why Galpi?
faqs.answer:
"Hookmark is a library; Galpi is a scout."

Hookmark supports 200+ apps but feels heavy. If Finder, Chrome, Obsidian, and Preview are 90% of your work, Galpi is better.

Galpi is 20x faster, uses 1/20th the RAM, and costs 1/14th the price. We built it for speed-demons.

faqs.question: Lifetime for $4.99? Is this a scam?
faqs.answer:
"Zero server cost = Zero recurring debt."

SaaS costs are high due to cloud bills. Galpi is Local-First. Every sale funds development, not AWS.

faqs.question: What if you stop updating the app?
faqs.answer:
"Your data outlives the app."

We use JSONLâ€”pure text. If we shut down, your links are still readable in any editor. We refuse to hold data hostage.

faqs.answer:
"We surgically optimized the scripts via Rust."

Standard apps are sluggish. We use Rust and the macOS Accessibility API for sub-30ms performance. It's not marketing; it's physics.

faqs.question: What if it doesn't work for me?

"7-day unconditional refund."

Mac environments vary. If it doesn't just 'work' or satisfy your speed requirements, email us. 100% refund, no questions asked.
